BBK01.OU1540: Bearer debt securities outstanding / Total / Commercial banks

General: Including negotiable subordinated bearer debt securities, excluding non-negotiable bearer savings bonds. From 1958, including bearer debt securities that have been sold but not yet delivered; up to 1967, including registered debt securities. Owing to the treatment of statistical breaks and revisions in the time series, see the section headed "Datainterpretation" in the "General notes".
